vat.error_text_orgNo: Please enter your Commercial Register Number in the correct format:
vat.error_text: Please enter your VAT number in the correct format: 9 numbers, followed by 'B', followed by 2 numbers (e.g. 123456789B12).
vat.hint_NL: 9 numbers followed by 'B' followed by 2 numbers (e.g. 123456789B12).
